> [kopykitty](#comment_5_16UYTd5pL9rt4hhxQAmfX89QqmjJB58xDx): KopyKate is now mobile friendly, too.. at least on Android phones.Try visiting the ZeroProxy at http://www.kittyseedbox.tk:43110/kopykate.bit using any smartphone with Android OS (won't work on anything made by Apple, because Apple hasn't implemented full WebRTC support yet). > You can use both Firefox and Chrome. Chrome seems to work faster. My alcatel Pixi phone views the site perfeclty, but videos are kinda slow. A Samsung Galaxy S7, on the other hand, would play 480p and 720p videos pretty smoothly.

No need to do it. Just download https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.mkg20001.zeronet
